website_summaries.verdict: Explore the gritty depths of Ravnica, where crafty players will find good use for the frog mutants, mighty angels, and deadly ogres that call it home.
pros: Includes 36 booster packs, with 540 total cards
There are 259 cards to collect in this series, and this series focuses on the brutal battles and unforgiving environment of Ravnica
cons: Again, while there are plenty of exciting cards here, and 36 booster packs will give you plenty to play with, you won’t uncover all 259 cards in one box

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for the card art
customer_reviews.text: This is the first booster set I have purchased for any card game ever. I dont even know how to play Magic anymore, I used to know many years ago. I just like opening the card packs and putting all the cards in sleeves while looking at the artwork. It brought me many hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Sealed box is what I hoped for, and they delivered
customer_reviews.text: I was mostly worried it wouldnt be a vaccuum sealed box like you would get from the LGS. I was glad to find it was a completely sealed case with no cracks in the wrapping. I checked the wrapping of each pack and nothing was out of the ordinary. Was a very solid buy as I packed 5 mythics and most usable rares. Some of the cards I got Mythics: Domri, Chaos Bringer Angel of Grace Ravager Wurm Kaya, Orzhov Usurper Prime Speaker Vannifar Some Rares: Electrodominance Incubation Druid Judith, the Scourge Diva Stomping Ground x2 Growth-Chamber Guardian Hallowed Fountain Blood Crypt Teysa Karlov Ethereal Absolution Deputy of Detention x2
customer_reviews.author: Samon Fayaz

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Got a bit less than I wanted but I read the reviews first.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as damaged as other people said theirs did. Cards not affected. That being said I bought to to not open. Not really that upset just kinda not great really. Price is about right I guess. Not great. Shipping in a padded envelope and not a cardboard box. I did read the reviews. I knew what I was getting into.
customer_reviews.author: timothy Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: It's Magic.. it's always good.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, are you really going to decide to buy this based on a review? It's Magic the Gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Fugetabutit

customer_reviews.title: Lame mythics and legendary distribution
customer_reviews.text: Two entire boxes of boosters and not a single Planeswalker. In fact, only 4 legendary cards in total. Quite a terrible mix.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moran

customer_reviews.title: Its MTG, what do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: This is just another chapter to the MTG collection. Same as you'd expect from any other set, high play-ability with a good selection of card.
customer_reviews.author: Derbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful artwork
customer_reviews.text: My brother was really happy with these. The beautiful artwork. The awesome creatures. Just overall great cards
customer_reviews.author: Jessie copher

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son for his birthday - he tells me he got a lot of good cards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: Always skeptical about buying cards anywhere other than my LGS or a big box store, but this was a good purchase. Sealed box with no damage, and I pulled some nice cards!
customer_reviews.author: T Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Gather these magic cards!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what a magic nerd needs! Played various games with unopened packs. Fun galore!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Arrived Fast and Undamaged
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy cards for my husband, for a surprise draft night for his Birthday. This was the best price I found. Shipped fast and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: NightmareKit

customer_reviews.title: Fun To Plasy
customer_reviews.text: The box of boosters was as expected after reading the pre-release notes. So many fun and powerful cards!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E. Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Great for holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. No tampering and no dings in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Got what i paid for
customer_reviews.text: Got what I expected, bought 2, opened 1, magic does this stupid slit in the boosters to aid people in opening them i think. Its stupid. Either that or my packs were resealed but i dont they they were resealed
customer_reviews.author: Mtg collector

customer_reviews.title: The box was professionally sealwd with wizards of the coast logo wrap
customer_reviews.text: The box of cards arrived super quickly and i was happy with the cards I pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls
customer_reviews.text: I pulled 5 mythics as well as some great lands out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Suede

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and as described also got some nice pulls
customer_reviews.author: Shane Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Shipping Is Extremely Slow
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but the fact that I paid for Prime one day shipping and didn’t receive my product until about a week later; really needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, no issues, bad pulls overall and barely broke even on the box for play it was great, for value not so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Got three foil mythics and made a pure aggressive Simic deck. An excellent addition to the MTG scene.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got some nice Mythics, though I wished I pull some planeswalkers
customer_reviews.author: Larry La

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged, worthless as collectible
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was very light and the box has damage on almost every corner. I buy the boxes as investments and this was an awful buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: MTGFan

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: super thrilled with thepules from this box and the price from amazon is great
customer_reviews.author: S & C

customer_reviews.title: WOTC, reprints. Really? You've got core sets for that. Hell, Masters set for that.
customer_reviews.text: I've not been overly fond of this latest Ravnica return. However, this was shipped to me quickly & I really do appreciate that. Good job
customer_reviews.author: Aunrah

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE CARDS
customer_reviews.text: The cards were wet, bent and had mold. The amazon box had no damage whatsoever so the product must have not been stored properly.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Chavez

customer_reviews.title: AMAZBALLS
customer_reviews.text: I love MTG it is one of my top Hobby's and thank God when I got this it was on sale so now I'm 1500 cards more to my collection I can't wait to open them and see what I got also I love how quickly it was shipped here
customer_reviews.author: Derek mikels

customer_reviews.title: Came with extra cards
customer_reviews.text: Just like the that it came with cards tht i needed and mire
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly, the hardest part was waiting for my friends before tearing into the packs. We played sealed two headed giant, which was fun. No signs of any resealing funny business, as there was an expected number of mythics in the box, including a Hydroid Krasis.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Nesser

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Fun to draft. Picked up one of each shock land in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Nswan

customer_reviews.title: Really borderline set
customer_reviews.text: Very chaff heavy. It's better to skip packs on this one. The limited environment is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Corrigan

product_meta.title: Magic: The Gathering Ravnica Allegiance Booster Box | 36 Booster Packs (540 Cards)
product_meta.description: A booster box contains 36 booster packs of Ravnica allegiance, the follow-up to the hit expansions guilds of Ravnica and core Set 2019. Each booster pack contains 15 magic cards (540 cards total). pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!
feature_bullets: STAND WITH YOUR GUILD. Ravnica is one of Magic’s most beloved settings, where guilds jockey for power and control and multicolored cards show up in force. New takes on Ravnica classics like Guildmages and split cards await.

BUILD DECKS. A booster box contains 36 booster packs of Guilds of Ravnica, the follow-up to the hit expansions Core Set 2019 and Dominaria. Each booster pack contains 15 Magic cards (540 cards total). Pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!

FILL YOUR BINDER. Ravnica Allegiance includes powerful planeswalkers like Domri, Chaos Bringer and Dovin, Grand Arbiter, as well as game-changing creature spells like Angel of Grace and Shock Lands like Breeding Pool and Godless Shrine (Note: cards listed are representative and not necessarily the cards you will receive.)

PLAY AT HOME. Your Guilds of Ravnica booster box holds enough packs to host your own booster draft with as many as twelve friends. (Note: a booster draft requires more basic land cards than a booster box includes.)

PLAY THE ORIGINAL. Magic: The Gathering is the first modern collectible card game. Magic has inspired more than 20 million fans over 25 years, from the first dragons and angels to today’s planeswalkers and Commander decks.

JOIN THE FAMILY. Wizards of the Coast has been making the world’s best strategy games for almost 30 years: Magic: The Gathering (MTG), Dungeons & Dragons (D&D), many board games under the Avalon Hill umbrella, and more. Explore them all, discover new favorites, and make new friends along the way.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars166 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
